posts.post_content: I signed up for an account just to add my 5/5 on this car and reminisce about how awesome it is. Waaaay back in the day, when Antiquities was a new thing, this was one of the columns of my blue/black control deck. Dark Ritual to Hypie specter first turn is my benchmark for devastating opening plays. I know Dark Ritual isn't making a comeback, but I'd love to see my ole Hypie Specter make a comeback.
